nodes.text: Hansh was a Human mercenary and a non-Force sensitive member of the Brotherhood of Darkness. Hansh fled from the Seventh Battle of Ruusan after the Army of Light managed to break through the Brotherhood's defenses, and returned to the Sith camp. While scavenging treasures and supplies, the group of mercenaries Hansh was with was attacked by Darth Bane.
Hansh, along with Lergan, was killed by Force lightning after attempting to flee from Darth Bane.
